Title: Speed
Text: These creeps have 25% increased movement speed.

Title: Greater Speed
Text: These creeps have 60% increased movement speed.

Title: Xtreme Speed
Text:
These creeps always move at maximum speed.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Slowing abilities will not work on these creeps!

Title: Slow
Text: These creeps have only 66% of their normal movement speed.

Title: Strong
Text: These creeps have 20% more HP, but grant 50% more exp and 25% more bounty.

Title: Rich
Text: These creeps grant 60% more bounty but no experience.

Title: Relic Raider
Text: These creeps grant only 50% bounty but have an 80% increased item drop chance and +30% item quality.

Title: Ultra Wisdom
Text: These creeps give no bounty and do not drop items but grant 300% experience.

Title: Armored
Text:
These creeps have increased armor.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Spell damage ignores armor so try to build some towers which deal spell damage.

Title: Heavy Armored
Text:
These creeps have greatly increased armor.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Spell damage ignores armor so try to build some towers which deal spell damage.

Title: Xtreme Armor
Text:
These creeps have extremely high armor but 25% decreased movement speed.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Spell damage ignores armor so try to build some towers which deal spell damage.

Title: Evasion
Text:
These creeps evade 25% of all attacks.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Active abilities will bypass creep evasion!

Title: Xtreme Evasion
Text:
These creeps evade 66% of all attack.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Active abilities will bypass creep evasion!

Title: Ghost
Text:
These creeps have a 90% chance to ignore the damage of a non-spell non-magic attack.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Always have some towers which deal spell damage or Magic damage at later levels.

Title: Spell Resistance
Text:
These creeps receive -50% spell damage.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Raw attack damage will help against these creeps, so don't really only on spell damage!

Title: Greater Spell Resistance
Text:
These creeps receive -80% spell damage.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Raw attack damage will help against thes creeps, so don't really only on spell damage!

Title: Magic Immunity
Text:
As long as these creeps have at least 10 mana, they are immune to all spell damage, Magic attack damage and targetable active abilities.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Raw attack damage will help against these creeps, so don't really only on spell damage! You can also use mana burn to deal with these creeps.

Title: Ethereal
Text:
These creeps periodically become ethereal, gaining immunity against attack damage (except Magic attack damage), but taking 40% more Magic attack damage and spell damage.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Towers that can deal heavy spell damage will be very useful against these creeps!
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] This ability can be stopped by silencing the creep.

Title: Slow Aura
Text: These creeps slow the attack speed of towers in 800 range by 50%.

Title: Mana Drain Aura
Text: These creeps decrease the mana regeneration of towers in 1200 range by 200%.

Title: Spellbinder
Text:
These creeps zap up to 3 mana-using towers in 1100 range every 5 seconds, stealing up to 30% of each tower's mana and silencing it for 5 seconds. Costs the creep 50 mana per zap.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Try to burn their mana before they burn yours!
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] This ability can be stopped by silencing the creep.

Title: Stun Revenge
Text:
Whenever attacked, these creeps have a 30% chance to stun the attacker for 3 seconds.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Abilities will not trigger the stun, only attacks!
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] This ability can be stopped by silencing the creep.

Title: Regeneration
Text:
These creeps regenerate hitpoints over time.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Kill these creeps fast!

Title: Xtreme Regeneration
Text:
These creeps regenerate a large amount of hitpoints over time.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Kill these creeps fast!

Title: Second Chance
Text:
Whenever these creeps receive mortal damage, they have a 50% chance to heal themselves if they have 1/3 of their mana left.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Use mana burn!

Title: Semi-Mechanical
Text:
These creeps have -50% debuff duration.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Auras and raw damage are useful against these creeps because they are not affected by reduced debuff duration.

Title: Mechanical
Text:
These creeps have -90% debuff duration.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Auras and raw damage are useful against these creeps because they are not affected by reduced debuff duration.

Title: Meaty
Text: Champions and bosses with this ability drop additional food upon death.

Title: Evolving
Text:
Any instance of damage above 5% of the creep's max hp will grant it 40% resistance against the attacking element, with halved effect on successive procs.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] If you have multiple carry towers, try to use different elements!

Title: Unlucky
Text:
When attacked, these creeps have a 30% chance to reduce their attacker's trigger chances by 10% for 8 seconds. This ability stacks.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] This ability can be stopped by silencing the creep.

Title: Flock
Text:
Birds are migrating from the winter countries! Double the usual amount will spawn.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] If you can't kill them all fast enough, be sure to have some towers that can slow them down.

Title: Protector
Text:
When a nearby creep dies, champions will channel a curse on the killing tower, reducing its attack and spell damage by 130% and its multicrit count by 2.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Be sure to kill the champions first!
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] This ability can be stopped by silencing the creep.

Title: Manashield
Text:
These creeps reduce damage they take by up to 80% by using mana. Less mana, less damage reduction. These creeps will explode when out of mana, leaving no corpse.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Mana burn is extremely useful against these creeps.

Title: Manashield+
Text:
These creeps reduce damage they take by up to 80% based on how much mana they have left. These creeps will explode when out of mana, leaving no corpse.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Mana burn is extremely useful against these creeps.

Title: Purge Revenge
Text:
These creeps have a 15% chance to purge their attacker of 2 purgeable buffs and slow its attack speed by 150% for 4 seconds.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] This ability can be stopped by silencing the creep.

Title: Dart
Text:
These creeps have only 40% of their normal movement speed, but have a 5% chance to dart forward when damaged. 6 second cooldown.
 
[color=GOLD]Hint:[/color] Relying solely on slows and stuns will be less effective on this boss!
